chunks.cleaned_english_translation: On Pentecost The Spirit of the Lord descended to the earth in fire, giving the apostles fiery hearts. He comforts them with His presence, seeing their souls burning with pure love.
chunks.original_latin:
In Pentecoste. Spiritus ad terras Domini descendit in igne,
Qui dat apostolicis ignea corda viris. Illos quippe suo refovet tutamine praesens,
Quorum ardere videt, casto in amore animos.
